title: Android 10 update - phone now unusable - how to downgrade?
content:
I'm looking for a way to go back to android 9.0
I installed android 10 a week ago, now any phone call crashes the OS and then spends 1-2 hours on relaunching screen.  The other apps work, but very slowly, and I just have to hope no-one calls! The headphone jack is no longer recognised so it will only ever play out loud too...
I have tried factory reset, removing recent apps, and even Google says they would just replace the phone (except I can't afford 5-10 business days without one)
I'd be grateful for any help!
